name: BattleBlade (itch)
description:
You are a Ninja tasked by the lovely staff of the Dojo to take out the trash... metaphorically. In this Gameboy-Style Platformer you will take out evil bug creatures set out by Count. Ligeste. You will climb 6 floors to fight Count. Ligeste in an Epic final battle! And hey mabye you'll find some secrets along the way! Like L̷͍̣̳͎̄̓ȇ̷̛̟̈́̆͋͠v̸̥͚̫͋e̴̝̮͍̩̩̿͆͑l̴͎͎̯̞̄ ̶̧̨̭͗͗̔3̴̨̎̊ ̸̺̫͔̇̔ and C̵͉͆̌ǒ̵̥͚̈́͆̉͠i̶̡̧͇͚̫͛̊̊͒̋̋ň̵̘̞̼̻̞͊͘s̵̢̞͓͎̖̠̐̒̌͒͛͘ ̴̢̢͖̖̫͛̽i̷̜̞̫̙̫͒͑̀͜ń̵̪̫̹̭̤͙̽̑̅̃ ̷̻͍̺̼͖͑̃͛V̵̡̩͍̦͐̈́ị̸̡̃c̴̮͐̈́̓͂̕t̴͍̹̤̀̌̅̿̈́o̵̢͎̘̮͕͊̚ͅr̴̹̫̝͑̀̿͐y̴̘̤̠̖̎̋̈́ ̶̟̆͂L̸͖̒͆͑ę̵̮̼͈͎̒v̷͓̺̦̭͚͇̈̀̔̕͘e̷͕̞̝̎̑͆̇̾l̴͈̖̖̖̲̈́̐! ... What was that... nevermind! Find the secrets out for yourself!

Do know there are some bugs, and the audio plays a little delayed.

CREDITS
